about_the_game: Experience the thrill of "To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora" in our demo! Dive into the world of Faenora, where you’ll lead a squad through a tactical RPG roguelite adventure filled with randomized encounters, strategic turn-based combat, and deep customization. Customize your hero and allies, make impactful choices, and endure the Wildlands to conquer the wild Gryphon. Each playthrough offers a new path and challenges. Get a taste of the adventure to come in the full game - one that's dangerously cute and strategically challenging!
detailed_description: Experience the thrill of "To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora" in our demo! Dive into the world of Faenora, where you’ll lead a squad through a tactical RPG roguelite adventure filled with randomized encounters, strategic turn-based combat, and deep customization. Customize your hero and allies, make impactful choices, and endure the Wildlands to conquer the wild Gryphon. Each playthrough offers a new path and challenges. Get a taste of the adventure to come in the full game - one that's dangerously cute and strategically challenging!

fullgame.name: To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (10.0.19043)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, NVIDIA GeForce 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Inspired by strategy RPG classics, Wildlands of Faenora is a roguelite tactical RPG where you lead a customizable squad in turn-based combat, navigating dynamic paths, battling mythical creatures, and discovering epic loot in a pixel art medieval fantasy world.
